mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userId, userPwd, userAut, userName, createDt) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userAut}, #{userName}, sysdate())
mapper.select: SELECT u.userSeq, u.userId, u.userName FROM user u
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (userSeq, projectName, isPublic, userVisibility) VALUES('1', #{projectName}, #{isPublic}, #{userVisibility})
mapper.select: SELECT projectId, projectName, isPublic, userVisibility FROM project WHERE 1=1 AND FIND_IN_SET(#{userId}, userVisibility) > 0
SELECT pdfId, userSeq, projectId, fileName, filePath, fileType, status, uploadDt FROM pdf_file WHERE 1=1 AND projectId = #{projectId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pdf_file (userSeq, projectId, fileName, filePath, fileType, status) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{projectId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT max(pdfId) as pdfId FROM pdf_file
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ocr_result (pdfId, pageNo, ocrText) VALUES ((SELECT max(pdfId) FROM pdf_file), #{pageNo}, #{ocrText})
mapper.select: SELECT a.ocrId, a.pdfId, a.pageNo, a.ocrText , pf.fileName,REPLACE(pf.filePath, '\\', '/') AS filePath, pf.fileType FROM ocr_result as a LEFT JOIN pdf_file pf on pf.pdfId = a.pdfId WHERE 1=1 AND a.pdfId = #{pdfId}
